stories.title: Hey Startups: It’s Not All About Direct Sales–Guide to Partnerships and Channels
Pretty permalinks without rewrite slug in WordPress

stories.text:
#askingforafriend CHUZA is - an app disrupting the Investment Management Industry. (Founder: Stuart Thompson) REMOTE (or onsite) DAO

We are adding to our team, so if you are very bright, curious, and co-operative; and are highly skilled in 3+ or hyperskilled in 2+ of the areas below, please email me (<181 words) at stuartdaa AT gmail DOT com with subject line "Add to CHUZA team in " plus the area you feel most suited to work in. In the (<181 word) text, please include your current timezone, and the languages in which you feel confident to work.

- Investment (Financial Markets) - Asset allocation - Data visualisation - Building a digital stack - Data: ETL - Data: Pivot, process query, compress, view - Dashboards design and build - Pan-platform design (incl android and iOS) - Psychographic mapping - Consumer Market Segmentation - Market adoption strategies - Game theory - Nash equilibria - Transition management - Game design - Coding - Engineering tokens into platforms - Social media - DAO design & build - Web 3.0 design and build - Analysis - Synthesis - Crypto transactions and layers - Multi-cultural product design - Consumer service
